result.eng: Workers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ga: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.orig: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.html: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí gá le hoibriṫe ċun an talaṁ a ġlanaḋ agus na bairr a ċur a ḃaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
